title: Understanding Slicers
text: Slicers provide a visual way to filter data in Excel. They are particularly useful when dealing with PivotTables.

title: Advantages of Slicers
text: Slicers allow you to filter data more easily and can be applied to multiple PivotTables at once.

hintAnswer: to perform filtering more easily and on multiple PivotTables
title: Choosing the Right Answer
text: Which of the following is a key advantage of using slicers over traditional filters?
choices: to perform filtering more easily and on multiple PivotTables
to perform filters more easily only
